activities:
Brillium collects information on behalf of itself and under the direction of its Clients on its Testcraft and Brillium Software Services Platform, For Clients, Brillium has no direct relationship with the individuals whose personal data it processes. Brillium works with its Clients to help them provide notice to their customers concerning, the purpose for which personal information is collected.  We collect the following kinds of personal information from our Clients: 

Contact Information such as name, email address, mailing address, phone number
Unique Identifiers such as user name and password

We also collect the following information from our Clients:
Information about your business such as company name, company size, business type
Assessement information
Training Information
Internet locations and/or links to external files, images, videos or other content

We use this information to:
Process Exams, Quizzes, Surveys and Assessments
Send you requested product or service information
Respond to customer service requests
Administer your account, including billing and payment information
Send you service maintenance notifications
Send you a newsletter
Send you marketing communications
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
